entries.title: Uploading assets for editorial workflow edits
entries.body:
## Problem

The following gap exists for the media library in EW implementations:

1. user creates and saves new EW draft entry
2. a new asset is uploaded
3. user edits the existing draft entry to use the newly uploaded image
4. the image is 404 in deploy previews because it doesn't exist on the DP branch

- - -

## Solution

When a file inserted during changes to an existing EW entry:

1. Use the file's SHA to determine if it's already on the entry's EW branch
2. If it's not, add it to `mediaFiles` to be persisted with the entry

Blobs should already be uploaded and accessible to all branches.

entries.title: UI Gaps
entries.body:
* Universal loading state
* No entries on collections page
* No image available for avatar (top right in header)
* Dropdowns - quick new, avatar (logout)
* No image for entry card on collections page
* Search results page heading
* Indicate collection on individual entries when all collections are searched

entries.title: UI Feedback
entries.body: * Is it worth having a description always visible in the collection view? It will probably be read most by new users, but the folks using a CMS installation a lot will want to get straight to content without the extra stuff.
